Coordinate clicks not working either.","expectedSignal":"Should see overlay with input field but nothing is happening","confidence":0.2,"type":"done","reasoning":"STUCK: After 4 actions including wait and multiple coordinate clicks, the Elements list consistently shows 0 items and no overlay appears. Either the page has severe accessibility issues preventing element detection, or the interactive elements aren't rendering properly. Cannot complete task without being able to detect or interact with the keyboard icon button."}
